title: Maigret and the Burglar's Wife
description: While committing what he intends to be his last burglary, "Sad Freddie" discovers something completely out of his the body of a dead woman, her chest covered in blood, holding a telephone in her hand. Inspector Maigret is called in to solve the crime, and after an exhaustive search, a psychological duel, a marathon interrogation, and innumerable glasses of Pernod, wine, cold beer, and brandy--a sure sign that this is no easy case--the famous French sleuth triumphs.
author: Georges Simenon
